properties.areaDesc: Scotts Bluff; Dawes; East Laramie County; Central Laramie County; Banner; South Sioux
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 2 at 2:17AM MST until February 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...SIGNIFICANT SNOW ACCUMULATIONS EXPECTED SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH
MONDAY FOR EAST CENTRAL THROUGH SOUTH CENTRAL WYOMING...

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches possible.

* WHERE...The Pine Ridge in Dawes County in the northern Nebraska
Panhandle...Laramie County to include the city of Cheyenne and
Pine Bluffs...as well as extreme western counties in the
Nebraska Panhandle to include Scottsbluff...Harrisburg and
Gering.

* WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
